languages.text: "Моя вера больше, чем набор правил. Это идеалы, и иногда они конфликтуют с догматом. А мне дарована воля, чтобы поправить его".
"My faith is more than a mere set of rules. It consists of ideals, which sometimes come into conflict with dogma. And I have been given the gift of will to set the dogma straight."
languages.original_text: "Моя вера больше, чем набор правил. Это идеалы, и иногда они конфликтуют с догматом. А мне дарована воля, чтобы поправить его".

traits.locale_text: "My faith is more than a mere set of rules. It consists of ideals, which sometimes come into conflict with dogma. And I have been given the gift of will to set the dogma straight."
"My faith is more than a mere set of rules. It consists of ideals, which sometimes come into conflict with dogma. And I have been given the gift of will to set the dogma straight."
"My faith is more than a mere set of rules. It consists of ideals, which sometimes come into conflict with dogma. And I have been given the gift of will to set the dogma straight."
"My faith is more than a mere set of rules. It consists of ideals, which sometimes come into conflict with dogma. And I have been given the gift of will to set the dogma straight."
"My faith is more than a mere set of rules. It consists of ideals, which sometimes come into conflict with dogma. And I have been given the gift of will to set the dogma straight."

languages.text: “我的信仰可不仅仅只是一套规则。它还包含着理想，而理想有时会与教条发生冲突。发生这种情况时，我会凭借我个人的意志纠正教条。”
languages.original_text: "My faith is more than a mere set of rules. It consists of ideals, which sometimes come into conflict with dogma. And I have been given the gift of will to set the dogma straight."

traits.locale_text: “我的信仰可不仅仅只是一套规则。它还包含着理想，而理想有时会与教条发生冲突。发生这种情况时，我会凭借我个人的意志纠正教条。”

languages.text: «Mi fe no es solo un conjunto de reglas. Está formada por ideales que a veces contradicen el dogma. Y me ha sido otorgado el don de la voluntad para aclarar el dogma».
languages.original_text: "My faith is more than a mere set of rules. It consists of ideals, which sometimes come into conflict with dogma. And I have been given the gift of will to set the dogma straight."

traits.locale_text: «Mi fe no es solo un conjunto de reglas. Está formada por ideales que a veces contradicen el dogma. Y me ha sido otorgado el don de la voluntad para aclarar el dogma».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}の信仰は単なる規則ではない。それは理想から成り立ち、時には教義と対立することもある。そして{mf|俺|私}には、ドグマを正す意志という才能が与えられているのだ」
languages.original_text: "My faith is more than a mere set of rules. It consists of ideals, which sometimes come into conflict with dogma. And I have been given the gift of will to set the dogma straight."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}の信仰は単なる規則ではない。それは理想から成り立ち、時には教義と対立することもある。そして{mf|俺|私}には、ドグマを正す意志という才能が与えられているのだ」

languages.text: "Mein Glaube ist mehr als nur ein Regelwerk. Er besteht aus Idealen, die manchmal mit dem Dogma im Widerspruch stehen können. Und ich habe die Gabe des Willens erhalten, um das Dogma geradezurücken."
languages.original_text: "My faith is more than a mere set of rules. It consists of ideals, which sometimes come into conflict with dogma. And I have been given the gift of will to set the dogma straight."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Glaube ist mehr als nur ein Regelwerk. Er besteht aus Idealen, die manchmal mit dem Dogma im Widerspruch stehen können. Und ich habe die Gabe des Willens erhalten, um das Dogma geradezurücken."

languages.text: « Ma foi est plus qu'une simple série de règles. Elle se compose d'idéaux, qui entrent parfois en conflit avec le dogme. Et j'ai reçu le don de la volonté pour corriger ce dogme. »
languages.original_text: "My faith is more than a mere set of rules. It consists of ideals, which sometimes come into conflict with dogma. And I have been given the gift of will to set the dogma straight."

traits.locale_text: « Ma foi est plus qu'une simple série de règles. Elle se compose d'idéaux, qui entrent parfois en conflit avec le dogme. Et j'ai reçu le don de la volonté pour corriger ce dogme. »

languages.text: "İnancım yalnızca bir dizi kuraldan ibaret değildir. Fikirler de içermekte olup bunlar zaman zaman dogmamla çatışır. Bana dogmamı doğru yola sokabilen bir irade bahşedilmiştir."
languages.original_text: "My faith is more than a mere set of rules. It consists of ideals, which sometimes come into conflict with dogma. And I have been given the gift of will to set the dogma straight."

traits.locale_text: "İnancım yalnızca bir dizi kuraldan ibaret değildir. Fikirler de içerir ve onlar da zaman zaman dogmamla çatışır. Bana dogmamı doğru yola sokabilen bir irade bahşedilmiştir."
